Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Variations on a Theme by Schumann, op. 9

1854

[IMSLP]

The theme, the first albumblatt from Robert Schumann’s Bunte Blätter (op. 99 no. 4), is followed by sixteen variations. Brahms’s later variation on a theme by Schumann (Anh. III/6) is based on the same theme.

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/5 [in preparation]
  • Henle · HN 440 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Margit McCorkle / Sonja Gerlach / Hans Kann / Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 438 · ed. Margit McCorkle
  • Könemann · K 115 · Variationen · ed. Enikő Gyenge

Duration: 17'

Difficulty: 4.5
